Darfate/Blacknightmare/Nightstrike:

"Yesss"hissed Darkfate"We should destroy the Matrix of Leader ship 
beofre Unicron arrives and its have to be hidden somewhere in 
MAximal base"

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> "We are to attack and gauge the Maximal base's strength.  They are 
the number one concern, so Unicron has sent us to see what those 
Maximals are capable of," Necross said as the approached the 
airlock.  Splattercannon opened the inside door and motioned for the 
othe four to go first.  Necross immediatly entered, and waited for 
the others.
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:Three other Bots soon joined 
them, one of them where a five headed transmetal dragon, the other a 
transmetal Reaven and the last a dark One headed Dragon.
> 
> "What are the commands ot Unicron the great"hissed the reaven to 
Necross while she flew, following them.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "The Archfiend of Eternal Flame" 
> <bustercross365@y...> wrote:
> > Deep inside Unicron, two robotic forms stir from their rest, and 
> > awake.  One was tall, with beam weapons mounted into his body.  
> His 
> > face was always a perpetual sneer, which cleverly disguised his 
> lack 
> > of thinking. The other, also tall, was much differant.  He was 
> like a 
> > dignitary or stately male.  But his regal appearance hide his 
> > incredible indurance, he survived many battles, and thus his 
> > judgement was affected.  He regarded his companion with disgust, 
> he 
> > was inferior.  Suddenly a fmale voice rang out.
> > "Splattercannon, Necross, you are to proceed to the Maximal base 
> on 
> > the planet.  Unicron's orders."
> > The female chuckled from an unseen corridor, as the first male 
> walke 
> > to an airlock.
> > "Hold it, you oaf, we need provisions, we need energon!" Necross 
> said.
> > "Well then let's get some and go!  Unicron commands!" 
> Splattercannon 
> > says as he turns an walks down another corridor.  They shortly 
> come 
> > upon an energon cache, consume their fill, and then leave for 
the 
> > planet below, intent on fighting this day.
>
